title: $1500 Off Move IN!! Renovated Units!! Move In Today!!
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Feet:', '973', 'Address:', '501 E Lake Mead Pkwy', 'Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.', 'Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', 'Polished kitchen countertops', 'Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Mountain views', 'Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', 'Separate dining area', 'Oversized closets', 'Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'State-of-the-art fitness center                                                                                         Featured amenity', 'Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements', 'Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball', 'Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating and firepit', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
